detectors.description:
SyncToken._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint96,uint96) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SyncToken.sol#313-324) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SyncToken.sol#316)
detectors.markdown:
[SyncToken._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint96,uint96)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SyncToken.sol#L313-L324) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SyncToken.sol#L316)

detectors.description:
SyncToken.delegateBySig(address,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SyncToken.sol#203-212) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(now <= expiry,SyncToken::delegateBySig: signature expired) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SyncToken.sol#210)
detectors.markdown:

detectors.description:
delegate(address) should be declared external:
